entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Whitecourt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -9.5°C
entry.summary:

Temperature: -9.5°C

Visibility: 3.2 km

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
